comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - use the latest BIRT runtime
   - deploy attached report to report viewer
     (note that report using xml data source on tomcat web server)
   - render report

expected behavior:

   - report is rendered properly

Created an attachment (id=58228)
xml data source
The plugin Xerces has not been included in BIRT runtime distribution, which defeat the loading of XML driver. Reassign to build team to correct this.

export xerces the same way as batik projects.

ExportEngineSDK target in source/org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer/WebViewerPackager.xml need to be updated.
